title: 820-00850 with NAND/SSD issues (A1989 2018)
message: This 820-00850 board came in with missing SSD power rail PP2V7_NAND_SSD0. I found a 2Ω short to ground on PPBUS_G3H_SSD0, which I fixed by replacing the voltage regulator U9080. Now I am left with a short on PP2V7_NAND_SSD0 (4Ω to ground). Injection of 2V into PP2V7_NAND_SSD0 warms up all four NAND chips. Is there any hope that the SSD is not toast?

title: 820-00850 with NAND/SSD issues (A1989 2018)
message: If the chips heat, no doubt...

title: 820-00850 with NAND/SSD issues (A1989 2018)
message: Is is possible to replace these chips with ones from a donor board?

title: 820-00850 with NAND/SSD issues (A1989 2018)
message:
Yes, but mark them before removing.
You must solder each chip in the same position.

title: 820-00850 with NAND/SSD issues (A1989 2018)
message: I can report successful replacement of the 4 NAND chips from a donor board to this 820-00850 board. For reballing, I used an iPhone NAND stencil.
